definition: broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: VOICE: So it sounds as if anabolic steroids can be very destructive.
sentences.chinese: 所以，聽起來合成代謝類固醇的破壞性會很大。

sentences.english: Either way, it’s really destructive to talk only about the dangers of sex.
sentences.chinese: 總之只跟孩子談性的危險是極具破壞性的。

sentences.english: Atomic weapons are forbidden because of their hugely destructive effects.
sentences.chinese: 原子武器由於具有極大的破壞性而被禁用。

sentences.english: But the thing about change is it’s disruptive.
sentences.chinese: 不過改變本身可能是破壞性的。

sentences.english: High-amplitude events are very destructive and significant.
sentences.chinese: 高烈度事件具有相當的破壞性且十分重大。

sentences.english: Failure load was assessed in 25-degree adduction with a bone gap.
sentences.chinese: 同時在25度內收位評估破壞性荷載。

sentences.english: Objective To control the destructive damage induced by termites using the method of toxic baits in new houses and buildings.
sentences.chinese: 目的採用藥餌法控制白蟻對新建房屋建築破壞性危害。

sentences.english: After a ruinous strike, the union caved in.
sentences.chinese: 一場破壞性的罷工之後，工會突然服軟了。

sentences.english: In order to achieve destructive purposes, al-Qaeda will do anything to.
sentences.chinese: 爲了達成破壞性目的，基地組織將無所不用其極。

sentences.english: Here are the most damaging animals ever to enter U.S. soil. By Cassie Rodenberg
sentences.chinese: 這裏說的是有史以來入侵美國的最具破壞性的動物。

sentences.english: They may contain malicious code with damaging potential.
sentences.chinese: 它們可能包含具有破壞性的惡意代碼。

sentences.english: The dielectric strength test can be made to be destructive or non-destructive.
sentences.chinese: 電氣強度測試可分爲破壞性和非破壞性。

sentences.english: The dielectric strength test can be made to be destructive or non-destructive.
sentences.chinese: 電氣強度測試可分爲破壞性和非破壞性。

sentences.english: Strong adjacent-field pulse ground motions pose severe potential damage to the structures.
sentences.chinese: 近場脈衝型地震動具有十分巨大的潛在破壞性。

sentences.english: These were damaging the conveyor bearings through the ingress of water and contaminants.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是破壞性的傳送帶軸承通過入水及污染物。

sentences.english: Reduces the risk of destructive pre-ignition.
sentences.chinese: 減少破壞性提前點火現象的發生。

definition: to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
